module.name: Say My Name
module.description: Allows you to generete a welcome text with googletts that can include name and/or surname of caller if he is in phonebook.
module.changelog: *1.0.9* Fix bug *1.0.8* Improve audio file *1.0.7* More debug *1.0.6* Fix agi script *1.0.5* Fix agi script again *1.0.4* Fix agi script *1.0.3* Display fix and more debug *1.0.2* Change class name *1.0.1* First version
